citation.title: Satellite Views of Plumes and Blooms in the Santa Barbara Channel (in) Channel Islands I: Introduction to Channel Islands National Marine Sanctuary

abstract.para: This 30 min video is an introduction to the Channel Islands National Marine Sanctuary designed for a nation-wide audience of middle school aged students. It includes six minutes on satellite views of sediment plumes and phytoplankton blooms in the Santa Barbara Channel.

publisher.organizationName: Project Oceanography, University of South Florida
